jokes.Joke: Think of how stupid the average person is, and realize half of them are stupider than that.
jokes.Creator: George Carlin

jokes.Joke: I never fucked a ten, but one night, I fucked five twos.
jokes.Creator: George Carlin

jokes.Joke: What year did Jesus think it was?
jokes.Creator: George Carlin

jokes.Joke: The real reason that we can't have the Ten Commandments in a courthouse: You cannot post Thou shalt not steal,� �Thou shalt not commit adultery, and Thou shalt not lie in a building full of lawyers, judges, and politicians. It creates a hostile work environment.
jokes.Creator: George Carlin

jokes.Joke: I'm not into working out. My philosophy is no pain, no pain.
jokes.Creator: George Carlin

jokes.Joke: Why do they lock gas station bathrooms? Are they afraid someone will clean them?
jokes.Creator: George Carlin

jokes.Joke: Why is it called tourist season if we can't shoot at them?
jokes.Creator: George Carlin

jokes.Joke: I've always wanted to be somebody, but I should have been more specific.
jokes.Creator: George Carlin

jokes.Joke: The Golden Gate Bridge should have a long bungee cord for people who aren't quite ready to commit suicide but want to get in a little
jokes.Creator: George Carlin

jokes.Joke: Why is the alphabet in that order? Is it because of that song?
jokes.Creator: George Carlin

jokes.Joke: If the black box flight recorder is never damaged during a plane crash, why isn't the whole damn airplane made out of that shit?
jokes.Creator: George Carlin

jokes.Joke: Get on the plane, get on the plane. I say, FUCK YOU! I'm getting IN the plane! Evel Knievel can get ON the plane. There seems to be less wind in here!
jokes.Creator: George Carlin

jokes.Joke: One nice thing about egotists: they don't talk about other people.
jokes.Creator: George Carlin

jokes.Joke: Do infants enjoy infancy as much as adults enjoy adultery?
jokes.Creator: George Carlin

jokes.Joke: In America anyone can become President. That's the problem.
jokes.Creator: George Carlin

jokes.Joke: One out of every three Americans is suffering from some form of mental illness. Think of two of your best friends. If they are OK, then it must be you.
jokes.Creator: George Carlin
